Text: FW Low flows to Oneok at BushtonFYI Original Message From Mendez Angela Sent Friday September PM To Greaney Chris Subject FW Low flows to Oneok at Bushton This is the explanation for the lower flow for for the Lean Inlet and Outlet and Angela Mendez Original Message From BushtonMaintenance Team Sent Friday September PM To Mendez Angela Subject Low flows to Oneok at Bushton Angela Please accept this as written documentation of the lower than normal flows to the Oneok extraction plant On September at PLT Unit dropped a valve in its power cylinder causing it to be declared not available As a result we were unable to maintain the normal flow rates to Oneok This situation existed until September at PLT when the unit was returned to service If you have further questions or need more information please cantact me or Casey Winter at Greg Reece Bushton Measurement
Oneok recap Cc Through Gas day
Bushton Balance Cc Through Gas day

New Years Day Cc NNG had EDI problems this morning Evidently TMS ran out of disc space cau sing all of the files to get hung up in the HUB for the Final cycle and the ID cycle The help desk was paged at am to report the problem To by responded but was having trouble reaching the on call TMS We did not g et a response until am from TMS the EDI files were in the HUB for over two hours Mary Draemer was very helpful and made follow up calls so w e could relay an estimated time frame to our customers when this problem wo uld be resolved Monday we also experienced printer problems w e were told that a print server was down the Solution Center was redirecti ng print servers on an individual basis at our work stations Kathy Washing ton could not print this morning and had tried to contact someone at the So lution Center and did not receive a response back for quite a while we we nt through the Help desk Toby and either he contacted Glen or Glen respon ded to the earlier page We had several technical problems to work through this morning but the most critical problem was trying to reach our support people New Years Morning Crew Kathy Washington Chris Greaney
team covergae Cc There are a few more updates to the schedule sent out yesterday This form is in excel under TCommonsouth centralvacationsched in case anyone needs to make any more adjustments

Plant ProceduresThere is new information in our TEAM PROCEDURE BOOK The White Binder that has our lovely team picture on it This information includes plant procedures for locations that NNG does not have set control on This is a guideline that the after hours weekend rep can use as a reference when gas controls calls with a problem The phone numbers and contacts are up to date however some of the plant names should be updated Ill work on that part next Joe and I will also put this information in a common folder so the team can update and can keep things current This will be in the book tabbed PLANT PROCEDURES remember these are locations NNG has no set control thanks Joe Linhart Chris Greaney

RE Report for Jan th thI did talk to Gas Measurement and they are only showing hours of flow on the th Im not sure about the th Verlene is checking with the measurement techs and theyll probably have to poll the stations again to get the volumes into the system correctly Original Message From Sturr Kathy Sent Tuesday January PM To Adams Jean Benningfield Robert Berger Larry Blair Lynn Buchanan John Cessac Kenneth Darveaux Mary Forbish Sherry Greaney Chris Herber Stephen Hibbard Scott January Steve Janzen Randy Kile Rick Kowalke Terry McCarran Penny McDaniel Janet Mendez Angela Schoolcraft Darrell Scurlock Debra Spraggins Gary Stage Michael G Sturr Kathy Woodson Harry Subject Report for Jan th th There looks like there are some measurment problems Therefore this report has not been done for these days Checking with measurement regarding the variances between scheduled and actuals Kathy

FW Lamar Nominations Feb Cc Original Message From ENRON On Behalf Of Sent Tuesday February AM To Spraggins Gary Linhart Joe Janzen Randy Cc Forbish Sherry Greaney Chris Subject Lamar Nominations Feb Attached is the NNG Lamar burn schedule for February At this time we plan on Thanks Jamie Schnorf FPL See attached file NNG Lamar Nominationxls NNG Lamar Nominationxls

RE MOPS UpdateUdate on MOPS continued The repairs are on hold for now until weather conditions improve currently there are rough seas off shore The crew is on sight and will contintue work as weather permits It is highly unlikely that the MOPS system will be back up and running this weekend according to the conference call the marine forecast will continue to be rough through the weekend Original Message From Vaughan Cara Sent Wednesday February PM To Blair Lynn Buchanan John Kowalke Terry Schoolcraft Darrell Barry Patrick Blair Jean Bryan Randy Callans Nancy Carr James Clapper Karen Perry Renee Porter Diana Walden Shirley Washington Kathy Wilkens Jerry Benningfield Robert Forbish Sherry Greaney Chris Hibbard Scott Janzen Randy Linhart Joe McDaniel Janet Scurlock Debra Sturr Kathy Vaughan Cara Woodson Harry Subject MOPS Update The South Central Team has been fielding several calls from customers regarding the status of MOPS Cara and Chris were invited to conference with the Tivoli Area and the crew working on the leak The latest information as of am Wednesday is as follows Operations The earliest the MOPS system will be unavailable this Saturday best estimate The diving crew has located the exact source of the leak and they are continuing repairs Right now the weather conditions look favorable and the forecast predicts that the good conditions should continue The leak is located feet below the surface which presents complications no matter the weather conditions At least one member of the South Central Team will listen in on the daily conference call am Central Time and will keep everyone updated this should help improve the accuracy and timeliness of our information Scheduling Darrell will set the operational capacity to through the th on the delivery locations If the MOPS system come back on before that time the operational capacities can be brought up This information is available on the bulletin board Remember to post as a FORCE MAJEURE on the allocations If receipt points explatform update the point and their deliveries will be cut Some customers have been calling and inquiring if they should nom gas in the MOPS system Noming gas is at the shippers discretion as long as the system is down we will continue to confirm their gas to and allocated the delivery points Please direct them to the bulletin board It is ok to let them know of our timeline please stress that this is an estimate If you are not comfortable answering any question please direct them to myself Chris Sherry or Bob Burleson We will keep up updated as the MOPS situation continues Cara will be on comp days Thurs and Friday Chris and Sherry will cover my desk and MOPS in my absence Thanks Cara and Chris

FW Lamar Nominations Feb Cc Jamie resent the email there must be a problem with her distribution list Original Message From ENRON On Behalf Of Sent Wednesday February AM To Spraggins Gary Linhart Joe Janzen Randy Cc Forbish Sherry Greaney Chris Subject Lamar Nominations Feb Attached is the NNG Lamar burn schedule for February At this time we plan on Thanks Jamie Schnorf FPL See attached file NNG Lamar Nominationxls NNG Lamar Nominationxls

FW Lamar Nominations Feb Cc I contacted Jamie Scnorf this morning she forgot to send the daily burn order via email yesterday She tried to send it this morning but for some reason it was returned to her Per Jamie there is no change to the order evidently there is a problem with the internet as she has tried to send this out several times this morning and we still havent received it Well probably get them all at once Original Message From ENRON On Behalf Of Sent Friday February AM To Spraggins Gary Linhart Joe Janzen Randy Cc Forbish Sherry Greaney Chris Subject Lamar Nominations Feb Holiday weekend Attached is the NNG Lamar burn schedule for February At this time we plan on Attached is the NNG Lamar burn schedule for February At this time we plan on Thanks See attached file NNG Lamar Nominationxls Jamie Schnorf FPL NNG Lamar Nominationxls
